description:
A versatile mind mapping tool for collaborative brainstorming.

EdrawMind is designed for creating fresh new visual innovations, integrating your bullet points to structure an overall mind map. It is convenient and helpful for you to use EdrawMind to sort out your thoughts or ideas in order to find solutions to problems.
YouTube Mindmap Summarizer
	1. Convert YouTube videos into mind maps. Just paste the URL, and get a clear mind map.
	2. Access the feature on the right panel of the Workbench homepage - Youtube Mind Map Summerizer.
Export PDFs to support jumping from web hyperlinks
	After exporting a PDF file, you can click the hyperlink to jump to the linked web page.
Optimization of intelligent file parsing
	Optimize the content output structure after file parsing.
Optimize Experience Upgrade
	1. Supports automatic software launch on startup.
	2. Organization chart layout (bidirectional, up and down) supports unbalanced layout effect.
